body: Guy is called James

I did some investigating and spoke to Mark from MZ on the phone yesterday. He said it is not them asking for the delay in news. It's all due to the regulators going over the PP. I spoke to the Ontario regulator and the service line explained that she can't give me any specific information but said it is very normal for there to be several weeks of delays with PPs.
We should expect financials by the 30th unless an extension is granted. So everyone sit tight and remember nothing has changed with the company. It's still priced in at the level of Q3 earnings.
